3: Why is this Nanami so damn elusive?
Can't shake her off when you're stuck with her. Can't find her when you need her.
I'll focus on the mission, I guess. Gray Raven has joined the operation as well. I must complete it before that Lucia.
...I'll get to the cellar if I blow up this wall. I'm not heading down fighting one floor at a time like all the other squads.
Detention area breached—detention area breached... Inmates taken—test subjects insufficient...
Locking on test subject... Do not run... Protect test subject...
Invader found...
(Struck by a sudden explosion) Protect—t-test subject...
I can't believe something like this is down here!
...?! They're all humans!
Don't... don't jab me...
Infect—i-infect—i-infect...
These are all equipment for biochemical tests... and all these people... are tied on those glass chairs...
That... is dried blood on those chairs.
And rotten human flesh.
You...
(Bangs the back of his head on the chair) Infect! Infect! Infect!
They've all gone mad!
(Looks at the flesh underneath through the skin of the test subject) The skin is new... the tissues underneath are all mush...
The bones... are all rotten...
That's what happens to organic begins after being infected by the Punishing Virus.
But why isn't his skin affected?
(Notices the tube inserted into his skin) ...No matter what they're injecting him with, it only stays on the surface level of his skin.
Hey! Don't move! (Removes the tube from his arm) ...
(Cuts the tube and inspects its interior) If I couldn't magnify my visual input... tch... I wouldn't have noticed these residues...
(Extends the nano-scalpel from her nail) Just... a little bit... a little bit...
(Puts the residue into the retriever) ...of this yellow material.
It looks like the golden antigen in the air. I'll send the analysis to the cloud for now. I'm not losing this data because of a fight.
But if the comms is disrupted, then so is the network channel.
I'll have to set up a transmission terminal myself to upload the report...
...How annoying!
Why do I have to do everything myself?!
Let's see what I can use around here...
Ah... Ah...
(Vocal unit flashing red) Infect—warning... Infect—w-warning...
The infection within the test subjects suddenly spreads. They twitch violently at first, then their flesh melts into a pool of goo...
Karenina stands there frozen, and there is nothing she can do...
